SELECT S.SP_NO ,S.SP_NAME ,S.SP_PRICE ,A.FILE_PATH ,A.CHANGE_NAME ,W.WISH_DAY FROM S_STORE S JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (S.FILE_NO= A.FILE_NO) JOIN S_WISH W ON (S.SP_NO = W.SP_NO) WHERE W.MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo} ORDER BY WISH_DAY DESC
